text: Great view of the city from the top of the slide tower. It is great for children to play as there are 2 slides and small pools around it for children to play in. Inside the tower, there are also ropes structures for children and adult to climb to the top. It is a great get away from the city life. Great playground.

ðŸ§¸Coastal Playgrove is a play area that caters to different child age group ranging from pre-schoolers to secondary school students.
ðŸ§¸The facilities includes 3rd & 4th floor high Slides for 13 yrs old and above.
ðŸ§¸A Water Play Area with wading pools and a connecting stream with several water jets that lights up at night time for 5 to 12 yrs old.
ðŸ§¸There is a Sandpit area and a Nature Playgarden. The Nature Playground let kids explore in a nature setting for 3 to 12 yrs old.
ðŸ§¸Further down is an Outdoor Classroom for pre-schoolers where lessons can be held in a nature by the sea. Children can observe a Hornbill nest perched on the nearby tree.
ðŸ§¸Coastal Playgrove, Slides is open from 8am to 10pm daily.
Water Playground open from 8am to 8pm daily.
Others are open 24hrs.
Closed on Monday or on Tuesday (if Monday is a Public Holiday) for maintenance.
ðŸ§¸Coastal Playgrove can be accessed from Amber Gardens Underpass.
ðŸ§¸Access to the facilities are free.
ðŸ§¸Washrooms are on site.
ðŸ§¸Food and drinks are available at nearby Old Town White Coffee and other eateries.

Great playground especially the net areas...however, this is also the worst slides we have tried..slides made of stainless steel (which is good), but too much friction and caused abrasions when rub against our skin..just be prepared to be stuck halfway..suggest NParks to think of ways to smoothen the slides..

Large semi sheltered playground with two metal slides at the tallest building. Water play area is a half circle circumference around the tallest building sheltered playground. My three year old  thoroughly enjoyed the experience.

Great open air water playground if you don't mind some fallen leaves and a couple of ants (this is not a place for those who are very particular about sanitizing everything!). The water is at different depths suitable for different abilities of crawlers and walkers. My kid had loads of fun splashing about! Gets crowded on weekends, much better on weekdays.
